entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
